fund: Short name or identifier of the investment fund.
forecastirr: Projected internal rate of return (IRR) for the fund based on current forecasts, expressed as a percentage.
forecast_moic: Projected multiple on invested capital (MOIC) under forecast assumptions.
current_irr: Most recently calculated internal rate of return for the fund, expressed as a percentage.
current_moic: Current multiple on invested capital based on realised and unrealised values to date.
geography: Primary regional focus of the fund’s investments.
sector: Industry sector focus of the fund.
asset: Type or strategy of the asset class (e.g., PE - Buyout, VC, Hedge Fund).
nature: Describes whether the investment is private, public, secondary, etc.
investment_date: Date on which the capital commitment to the fund was made or investment commenced.
committed: Total capital commitment made by the limited partner in original fund currency. **Do not use it to calculate total investment amount.**
funded: Cumulative capital that has actually been called (drawn down) to date.
o_s: Outstanding capital yet to be funded (negative indicates over-funding).
distribution: Total cash and stock distributions returned to the investor to date.
current_mtm_value: Current mark-to-market valuation of the remaining interest in the fund.
total_earned: Net gain or loss realised to date (distributions plus unrealised value minus contributions).
fund_full_name: Legal name of the investment fund.
initial_closing_date: Date of the fund’s first closing when it began accepting investor commitments.
final_closing_date: Date of the fund’s final closing when fundraising ended.
vintage_year: Calendar year in which the fund started investing (vintage).
general_partner_gp: Legal entity acting as the fund’s general partner.
investment_manager: Firm responsible for managing the fund’s assets.
fund_term: Contractual life of the fund stated in the limited partnership agreement.
extensions: Permitted extension periods to the original fund term.
investment_period: Defined period during which the GP can call capital for new investments.
fund_size_total_commitment: Total committed capital to the fund from all investors, as stated by the GP.
minimum_commitment: Minimum subscription amount required from any limited partner.
gp_commitment: Capital committed by the general partner to the fund.
financial_year_end: Fiscal year-end date used for the fund’s reporting.
accounting_principles: Accounting standard followed for the fund’s financial statements (e.g., US GAAP).
fund_performance_indicator: Qualitative or proprietary performance rating assigned to the fund.
fair_value_of_porfolio_companies_usdol_m: Fair value of the underlying portfolio companies in millions of U.S. dollars.
total_net_asset_value_usdol_mil: Latest net asset value (NAV) of the fund in millions of U.S. dollars.
fund_gross_multiple_x: Gross multiple of invested capital before fees and carry.
fund_net_multiple_x: Net multiple of invested capital after fees and carry.
fund_gross_irr_pct: Gross IRR of the fund before fees and carried interest.
fund_net_irr_pct: Net IRR to limited partners after fees and carried interest.
fund_distribution_to_paid_in_capital_dpi: Fund-level DPI (Distributions to Paid-In Capital) expressed as a percentage.
ccg_performance_indicator: Custom classification code or rating used by the bank for performance monitoring.
commitment_usdol_mil: Investor’s capital commitment to the fund expressed in millions of USD. Do not use it to calculate total investment amount. **Do not use it to calculate total investment amount.**
ownership_pct: Investor’s percentage ownership of total fund commitments.
remaining_unfunded_commitment_usdol_mil: Uncalled portion of the investor’s commitment in millions of USD.
cumulative_distribution_usdol_mil: Total cash and stock returned to the investor to date in millions of USD.
capital_account_balance_usdol_mil: Investor’s current capital account balance (NAV) in millions of USD.
call_up_percentage_pct: Percentage of the investor’s commitment that has been called to date.
distribution_to_paid_in_capital_dpi_pct: Investor-level DPI ratio expressed as a percentage.
multiple_x: Investor-level multiple on invested capital (TVPI or MOIC).
fee_term: Summary of management fee structure set out in the partnership agreement.
management_fees_investment_period: Management fee rate applicable during the investment period.
management_fees_after_investment_period: Management fee rate applicable after the investment period ends.
preferred_return: Preferred return (hurdle rate) promised to limited partners before carry is paid.
carried_interest: Percentage of profits allocated to the general partner as carried interest.
lp_reporting_timeline: Agreed timeline or requirements for LP reporting deliverables.
quarterly_report_after_period_end: Number of days after quarter-end by which the GP must deliver a report.
annual_report_after_period_end: Number of days after year-end by which the GP must deliver the annual report.
drawdown_notice: Notice period required before capital is called from investors.
dpi_x: Distribution to Paid-In Capital multiple (DPI) expressed as a factor (x).
rvpi_x: Residual Value to Paid-In Capital multiple (RVPI) expressed as a factor (x).
tvpi_moic_x: Total Value to Paid-In Capital or MOIC multiple (TVPI) expressed as a factor (x).
irr: Another representation of the internal rate of return, possibly at the deal or currency level.
upside: Absolute unrealised gain in currency terms, reflecting potential upside.
total: Text or flag field summarising total status or allocation group (context-specific).
moic: Another field for multiple on invested capital, possibly a duplicate or alternative view.
irr_1: Alternative IRR calculation (e.g., forecast, deal-level, or different currency basis).
inception: Inception date of the investor’s commitment or share class.
expiry: Contractual expiry date of the fund or of the specific commitment.
entity: Legal entity through which the investor is investing (e.g., feeder vehicle).
fee_pct: Management fee rate expressed as a percentage.
carry_pct: Carried interest rate expressed as a percentage.
